title: Lucians Auto bug (I think)
body:
Playing Lucian {{champion:236}} recently and noticing that he stops , snaps into position then fires creating a small delay when he auto attacks 
I'm not sure that's meant to be right but yeah that's what me and my friends have been seeing lately.

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you feel you've discovered a bug, please make a thread over on the [Report a Bug board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) on the NA site.

Before posting, be sure to read the "[How to Report a Game Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug)" thread.
